briefdescription.para: Constructor.

detaileddescription.para:
Constructor, sets frames between which rotation is determined.
baseFrameOrientation
Base frame identifier.
targetFrameOrientation
Target frame identifier.

briefdescription.para: Virtual destructor.

detaileddescription.para: Virtual destructor.

briefdescription.para: Get rotation quaternion from target frame to base frame.

detaileddescription.para:
Pure virtual function to calculate and return the rotation quaternion from target frame to base frame at specified time.
secondsSinceEpoch
Seconds since Julian day reference epoch.
Rotation quaternion computed.

briefdescription.para: Get rotation quaternion from target frame to base frame in Time precision.

detaileddescription.para:
Pure virtual function to calculate and return the rotation quaternion from target frame to base frame at specified time.
timeSinceEpoch
Seconds since Julian day reference epoch.
Rotation quaternion computed.

briefdescription.para: Get rotation quaternion from target frame to base frame in templated precision.

detaileddescription.para:
Pure virtual function to calculate and return the rotation quaternion from target frame to base frame at specified time.
timeSinceEpoch
Seconds since Julian day reference epoch.
Rotation quaternion computed.

briefdescription.para: Get rotation quaternion to target frame from base frame.

detaileddescription.para:
Pure virtual function to calculate and return the rotation quaternion to target frame from base frame at specified time.
secondsSinceEpoch
Seconds since Julian day reference epoch.
Rotation quaternion computed.

briefdescription.para: Get rotation quaternion to target frame from base frame in Time precision.

detaileddescription.para:
Pure virtual function to calculate and return the rotation quaternion to target frame from base frame at specified time.
timeSinceEpoch
Seconds since Julian day reference epoch.

briefdescription.para: Get rotation quaternion to target frame from base frame in templated precision.

detaileddescription.para:
Pure virtual function to calculate and return the rotation quaternion to target frame from base frame at specified time.
secondsSinceEpoch
Seconds since Julian day reference epoch.
Rotation quaternion computed.

briefdescription.para: Function to calculate the derivative of the rotation matrix from target frame to original frame.

detaileddescription.para:
Function to calculate the derivative of the rotation matrix from target frame to original frame at specified time, to be implemented by derived class.
secondsSinceEpoch
Seconds since Julian day reference epoch.
Derivative of rotation from target (typically local) to original (typically global) frame at specified time.

briefdescription.para: Function to calculate the derivative of the rotation matrix from target frame to original frame in Time precision.

detaileddescription.para:
Function to calculate the derivative of the rotation matrix from target frame to original frame at specified time, to be implemented by derived class.
timeSinceEpoch
Seconds since Julian day reference epoch.
Derivative of rotation from target (typically local) to original (typically global) frame at specified time.

briefdescription.para: Function to calculate the derivative of the rotation matrix from target frame to original frame in templated precision.

detaileddescription.para:
Function to calculate the derivative of the rotation matrix from target frame to original frame at specified time, to be implemented by derived class.
timeSinceEpoch
Seconds since Julian day reference epoch.
Derivative of rotation from target (typically local) to original (typically global) frame at specified time.

briefdescription.para: Function to calculate the derivative of the rotation matrix from original frame to target frame.

detaileddescription.para:
Function to calculate the derivative of the rotation matrix from original frame to target frame at specified time, to be implemented by derived class.
secondsSinceEpoch
Seconds since epoch at which ephemeris is to be evaluated.
Derivative of rotation from original (typically global) to target (typically local) frame at specified time.

briefdescription.para: Function to calculate the derivative of the rotation matrix from original frame to target frame in Time precision.

detaileddescription.para:
Function to calculate the derivative of the rotation matrix from original frame to target frame at specified time, to be implemented by derived class.
timeSinceEpoch
Seconds since epoch at which ephemeris is to be evaluated.
Derivative of rotation from original (typically global) to target (typically local) frame at specified time.

briefdescription.para: Function to calculate the derivative of the rotation matrix from original frame to target frame in templated precision.

detaileddescription.para:
Function to calculate the derivative of the rotation matrix from original frame to target frame at specified time, to be implemented by derived class.
secondsSinceEpoch
Seconds since epoch at which ephemeris is to be evaluated.
Derivative of rotation from original (typically global) to target (typically local) frame at specified time.

briefdescription.para: Function to retrieve the angular velocity vector, expressed in base frame.

detaileddescription.para:
Function to retrieve the angular velocity vector, expressed in base frame. Thsi function uses the functions that calculate the rotation matrix and its time derivative. It may be redefined in a derived class, to calculate the angular velocity vector directly
secondsSinceEpoch
Seconds since epoch at which ephemeris is to be evaluated.
Angular velocity vector, expressed in base frame.

briefdescription.para: Function to retrieve the angular velocity vector, expressed in target frame.

detaileddescription.para:
Function to retrieve the angular velocity vector, expressed in target frame. This function calls the function that calculates the angular velocioty vector in the base frame, and rotates it to the target frame. It may be redefined in a derived class, to calculate the angular velocity vector directly
secondsSinceEpoch
Seconds since epoch at which ephemeris is to be evaluated.
Angular velocity vector, expressed in target frame.

briefdescription.para: Function to calculate the full rotational state at given time.

detaileddescription.para:
Function to calculate the full rotational state at given time (rotation matrix, derivative of rotation matrix and angular velocity vector).
currentRotationToLocalFrame
Current rotation to local frame (returned by reference)
currentRotationToLocalFrameDerivative
Current derivative of rotation matrix to local frame (returned by reference)
currentAngularVelocityVectorInGlobalFrame
Current angular velocity vector, expressed in global frame (returned by reference)
secondsSinceEpoch
Seconds since epoch at which ephemeris is to be evaluated.

briefdescription.para: Function to calculate the full rotational state at given time.

currentAngularVelocityVectorInGlobalFrame

briefdescription.para: Function to retrieve the current rotation as a state vector.

detaileddescription.para:
Function to retrieve the current rotation as a state vector (quaternion entries of body-fixed to base frame, and angular velocity vector in body-fixed frame.
time
Seconds since epoch at which ephemeris is to be evaluated.
Current rotation as a state vector

Function to calculate the full rotational state at given time.
Function to calculate the full rotational state at given time.
Base class for rotational ephemerides of bodies.

detaileddescription.para: Base class for rotational ephemerides of bodies. The rotation (quaternion) between two frames specified by member variable ids can be calculated as a function of time in the manner determined by the derived class.
